shared.description: Specifies whether to generate a shared project or a {N} only

sourceDir.description: The path of the source directory.

minimal.description: Create a minimal app (inline styles/templates, no theme or routing).

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

style.description: The file extension to be used for style files. Supported are css and scss

theme.description: Specifies whether the {N} theme for styling should be included.
